realm.name: veo-content-creator
realm.description: May create new domain-templates and form-templates.

realm.name: read_write_all_units
realm.description: Grants RW access to all unit IDs. Also grants the unit:create/delete/update action roles.

realm.name: veo-admin
realm.description: Gives a user in veo admin rights

realm.name: unit_access_restriction
realm.description: Activate the access restrictions for units.

realm.name: veo-user
realm.description: Gives a user the basic user scopes.

realm.name: veo-write
realm.description: Allows write (state-changing) access to veo services.

veo-accounts.name: account:delete
veo-accounts.description: Allows to completely delete a VEO account.

veo-accounts.name: account:manage
veo-accounts.description: Grants all rights to the account management.

veo-accounts.name: account:read
veo-accounts.description: Allows viewing the list of accounts and the details of those accounts.

veo-accounts.name: account:create
veo-accounts.description: Allows creating additional VEO accounts up to the applicable limits.

veo-accounts.name: license-key:set
veo-accounts.description: Permits to define an initial license key for the veo instance or replace the existing license key.

passwordPolicy: notUsername(undefined) and notEmail(undefined) and length(8) and passwordBlacklist(10-million-password-list-top-1000000-normalized.txt)

clients.name: VEO accounts

attributes.consent.screen.text: Allows creating, managing and deleting accounts for VEO

clients.name: verinice.veo on-premise
clients.description: The web-based ISMS tool provided by SerNet.

clientScopes.name: basic
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add all basic claims to the token

clientScopes.name: service_account
clientScopes.description: Specific scope for a client enabled for service accounts

clientScopes.name: web-origins
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add allowed web origins to the access token

clientScopes.name: veo-license
clientScopes.description: Limits for veo users imposed by their license

clientScopes.name: acr
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add acr (authentication context class reference) to the token

clientScopes.name: veo-account
clientScopes.description: Access rights regarding the creation and management of veo-accounts

clientScopes.name: roles
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add user roles to the access token
